oai_dc:dc.dc:title: W.C. Handy and his band
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Performing Identity
Musicians
Handy, W. C. (William Christopher), 1873-1958; African American musicians;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This autographed photograph is inscribed to Robert Church from W.C. Handy.
"To my esteemed friend Mr. Robert R. Church With my best wishes, W.C. Handy June 3, 1918."
